It was a pleasure and a honor to give a talk at [Laboratory of Solid Mechanics (LMS)](https://lms.ip-paris.fr/en/overview); I presented the adjoint method together with some applications on topology optimization and magnetic forces computations, and had a lot of very interesting discussions!
